dashboard.heroTitleSuffix: , here's how you can make an impact today
dashboard.heroDescription: Pick one action, log it, and share it with your neighbors. Together we build a kinder block.

submit.heroTitle: Submit a deed to keep your streak going
submit.heroDescription: Share what you completed, who benefited, and any partners who joined you. Your story appears in the community feed once approved.

form.titleHelp: Keep it short and celebratory so your neighbors can cheer you on.
form.categoryHelp: This helps us highlight different impact areas on the leaderboard.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Share the story, who participated, and who benefited.
form.descriptionHelp: Add context so our block captain can quickly verify the deed.
form.proofHelp: Share a link to photos, receipts, or a short write-up that proves the deed happened.
form.verificationHint: That's it! Once your deed is verified you'll see credits added to your account.

leaderboard.heroDescription: Track the top contributors this week and cheer on your block. Rankings reset every Monday at 9 am.
leaderboard.empty: No neighbors on the leaderboard yet. Complete a deed to claim the top spot!
leaderboard.error: We couldn't load the leaderboard right now. Please try again later.
leaderboard.blocksEmpty: No blocks have verified deeds yet.
leaderboard.blocksHint: Blocks with 25+ deeds unlock a neighborhood celebration.
leaderboard.shoutoutsEmpty: Complete a deed to unlock neighbor shoutouts.

badges.sectionDescription: See what still needs review and what is already verified.
badges.profileDescription: Celebrate what you've completed and what still needs review.

pending.title: Pending review
pending.description: {{count}} deed(s) are waiting for a quick look.

firstVerified.title: Verified neighbor
firstVerified.description: You've unlocked credits with your first verified deed.

blockCaptain.title: Block captain
blockCaptain.description: 10+ verified deeds puts you in the neighborhood hall of fame.

badges.none: Complete a deed to unlock your first badge.

choose.heroTitle: Choose a deed that fits your schedule
choose.heroDescription: Browse curated opportunities from trusted community partners. Each option includes the estimated time commitment and the neighbor you will support.

auth.loginSubtitle: Log in to pick your next good deed.
auth.signupSubtitle: Join your neighbors and start earning credit for good deeds.

verify.heroSubtitle: Confirm proof links, then approve each deed to award credits instantly.
verify.empty: You're all caught up! New deeds will appear here as they arrive.
verify.flashEmpty: No pending deeds at the moment.
verify.flashError: We couldn't load the pending queue. Please try again shortly.
